translation.en: [boy] ♪ There once was a lord ♪
♪ In dark woods ♪
♪ Wearing a strange silver band ♪
♪ Around his hand ♪
♪ The band was charmed With ore from stars ♪
♪ Bidding all monsters away ♪
♪ Away ♪
♪ On that quiet eve ♪
♪ Among these trees ♪
♪ A bandit slew the good lord ♪
♪ Stealing that band ♪
♪ Off a dead man's hand ♪
♪ For the bandit also feared ♪
♪ Monsters ♪
Sugo, keep your eyes and ears open!
translation.ko: 슈고, 눈 귀 다 열고 경계해!

translation.en: It's frightening the girls.
-[Sugo] They wouldn't even be scared… -[grunts] …if you hadn't gotten lost.
Really, Papa, you grew up in Kaedwen.
King clearly dug new trails. [grunts]
[girl] Is it true, Papa?
Are bandits killing innocents along these trails?
translation.ko: 이런 데서 산적 떼가 사람들을 죽여요?

translation.en: [man] Oh, pumpkin.
There are no bandits. [grunts]
No!
-Sister! -[limbs squelching]
[Sugo] A witcher.
[witcher chuckles] Fancy look.
You must make a killing at druid festivals.
Don't usually see your sorts around these parts.
translation.ko: 이 부근에 네 동족은 흔치 않은데

translation.en: -Ha! I see. -[creature snarling]
You're a trailblazer, flaunting the new fad.
Trendsetter, you.
-[screeches] -Very bold! [grunts]
Whoa, there. People should get acquainted more, really.
[grunts] Converse, a little foreplay.
Especially when one's about to kill the other.
Though you leshens don't speak, so there's the rub.
translation.ko: 한데 레셴은 말을 못 하니 그것이 문제로군

translation.en: [grunts] Forest hobo or deadly, flapping swarm.
Let's pick a look… [grunts]
…and stick with it.
Deadly, flapping swarm it is.
Away. It's not dead.
So kill it. You're a witcher.
There are several ways to kill a leshen.
Behead it, sacrifice a few of its furry pets,
even a few old dryad spells will do.
Which will you…
[leshen] Garean bhaedh aip me vhoelynath.
Garean bhaedh aip me vhoelynath.
Thought you said they don't speak?
[hissing whisper] Garean bhaedh aip me vhoelynath.
They don't.
Wait!
Wait. I'm noble blood.
You can't leave me here.
What am I to do?
He said, "Practice your sad face,
and maybe a passerby will offer you a ride."
[woman] And what of your sisters?
The witcher said to use my sad face on the alderman too.
translation.ko: 위쳐가 시장한테도 슬픈 표정을 지어 보이랬어요

translation.en: So he'd spare some men to…
gather the bodies.
Dry eyes, child.
I'll see that your father and sisters are returned to you and laid to rest properly.
translation.ko: 아버지와 누이들이 네 곁으로 돌아와 편히 쉬도록 해주마

translation.en: [woman] Sugo's father was a treasured member of the Assembly
and a loyal subject to our king.
My students and I resubmit our petition.
translation.ko: 제 학생들과 저는 다시 한번 청원하는 바입니다

translation.en: Seize the witcher home of Kaer Morhen
and exile its occupants for crimes against Kaedwen's people.
translation.ko: 케드웬 백성을 괴롭힌 죄로 그 무리를 추방해 주십시오

translation.en: From what the boy told us, Your Highness,
the witcher slew the leshen that was terrorizing our forests.
translation.ko: 위쳐가 우리 숲을 침략한 레셴을 처치했다고 했습니다

translation.en: Lady Zerbst, since when have leshens prowled about Kaedwen,
translation.ko: 레이디 저브스트, 레셴이 언제부터 케드웬에 출몰했죠?

translation.en: never mind with such hostility?
Oh, you're suggesting the witchers have been staging these forest attacks.
translation.ko: 그러니 위쳐가 레셴을 꾀어 숲을 침략하게 했다는 건가?

translation.en: So scandalous, Madam Gilcrest.
Monster species have dwindled under their swords.
-[murmuring] -They need coin.
Some have turned to mercenary work, others criminality.
translation.ko: 그래서 용병이 되거나 범죄를 일삼기도 합니다

translation.en: One even took a bounty on a cheating husband's head.
translation.ko: 바람난 남편의 목에 걸린 포상금을 탄 자도 있죠

translation.en: And you have evidence to prove your conspiracy?
Or are we to merely bank on your magical intuition?
translation.ko: 아니면 당신의 마법 같은 직감을 따라야 하는 건가요?

translation.en: It's their natures, my lady.
Witchers are the offspring of foul sorcery.
Roaming our lands,
voting themselves the stalkers of evil,
extorting coin from the gullible.
Honest, simple peasants who ascribe all misfortune to spells and monsters.
translation.ko: 불행이 마법과 괴물 탓이라는 정직하고 소박한 농민들을요

translation.en: Mages create the witcher.
Then presume it's our duty to hold the bucket and mop up their brown mess.
translation.ko: 이제 와 우리더러 자기들이 싼 똥을 치우라는군요

translation.en: I'm with Lady Zerbst on this one.
The witchers remain at Kaer Morhen.
At least until such time as evidence is provided
that supports your theory.
When a witcher inflicts pain,
he experiences ecstasy.
[hooded figure] The creature's words are Ellyon.
A dead elven dialect linked to darker times.
translation.ko: 암흑의 시대와 연결된 사장된 엘프 방언

translation.en: Few remember the ancient tongue. Fewer dare speak it.
translation.ko: 기억하는 이도 드물고 말하는 이는 더 드물지

translation.en: But how a leshen would know it
or be afraid of some den--
Never said it was afraid.
You speak Ellyon, don't you, Filavandrel?
You witchers are desperate for coin.
Turning to elves for leads on work.
These pleasures do not pay for themselves. What did the leshen say?
translation.ko: 이런 호사가 어디 거저겠나? 레셴이 한 말이 뭐야?

translation.en: "Beware the den of my dead."
Hmm. Things you don't wish to hear in a bath.
Did you notice anything else unusual?
There was an energy in the woods.
Some sort of magic, maybe.
Controlling the leshen, bewitching it.
What's your face?
Over the last four summers,
girls have been disappearing from our ranks.
Oh, God, no elf drama.
[Filavandrel] The first we feared were deserting us after the last cleansing.
translation.ko: 처음엔 지난 청소 후 우릴 떠난 거라고 생각했어

translation.en: -But the disappearances haven't stopped. -Tragic, really. Very terrible.
translation.ko: 그런데 계속해서 사라지더군 비극이야, 아주 끔찍해

translation.en: One of the first to vanish was a young mage, Kitsu.
translation.ko: 처음에 사라진 아이 중에 킷수라는 어린 마법사가 있었어

translation.en: She spoke Ellyon. We should return to these forests.
translation.ko: 킷수가 엘리언을 했지 그 숲으로 같이 가보세

translation.en: See, I'm a monster hunter, Fil,
not an elf wrangler, not even the murderous ones, but good luck.
translation.ko: 엘프 몰이꾼이 아니지 사악한 애들은 더 싫고 잘 다녀와

translation.en: [Filavandrel] A favor to a friend, then?
[witcher] Favors and friends don't pay bills.
Quite the opposite.
[Filavandrel] You've really no shame.
I have a reputation and a healthy estimation of my talent's worth.
translation.ko: 난 명성도 있고 내 재능에 합당한 보수도 받아

translation.en: My apologies for trying to save you from a wasted winter at Kaer Morhen.
translation.ko: 케어 모헨에서 낭비할 겨울이 아까워 물었네만 미안하군

translation.en: [laughs] Wasted?
Well, there's drinking, eating, sleeping.
All free.
[Filavandrel] And the training of another greedy gang of young witchers.
translation.ko: 탐욕에 눈먼 어린 위쳐들을 더 양성하기도 하지

translation.en: I leave that to my peers.
Imagine if you witchers labored for more than just thrill and coin.
translation.ko: 너희 위쳐가 짜릿함과 돈만 좇는 게 아니면 얼마나 좋을까

translation.en: Imagine if you elves wielded your swords
-as well as you do guilt. -[cloak rustling]
[woman] Please! Get them!
[man] Vesemir, get over here!
[woman muttering incoherently] Where do… Hey! They must go!
Now they're nibbling. No! [giggles]
Licking. Ooh! They're licking.
-[laughing] Oh! Tongues! -[men grunting]
-[woman] No! Aah! -Vesemir!
I told you, double knots!
-I did, Father. Just as you showed. -[woman wailing]
Let's see if the boy can handle fetching a wet cloth.
translation.ko: 저 아이가 물수건은 가져올 수 있나 보세

translation.en: A lesser man would sell your boy to another family.
translation.ko: 내가 옹졸했다면 다른 집에 팔아넘겼을 거네

translation.en: [man] Yes, sir.
At least my son proves a measure of your generous character.
translation.ko: 저 애를 거두어주시다니 주인님의 너그러움이 하해와 같으십니다

translation.en: Head to the market. We will need blue gum to sedate our lady.
translation.ko: 장터에서 부인을 진정시킬 유칼리를 사 오너라

translation.en: -[woman] No! -Try not to cock it up.
Please stop! Please make it stop!
-[man] No. -[woman] No!
Stop fidgeting!
Poor Illyana. I didn't even have to take a shot.
translation.ko: 가여운 일리아나 난 눈도 안 던졌는데

translation.en: Moron! You could've killed me.
Here to bother me?
The Lord insisted I look after you in the market.
translation.ko: 주인님이 너 시장 가는데 꼭 따라가랬어

translation.en: Seemed rather pissed.
We slave away all day long, getting shout at,
and the only coin we get is when we're sent to fetch them goods.
translation.ko: 주인들 물건 사러 갈 때나 동전 몇 개 쥐어보지

translation.en: Just be happy you have a roof over your head and your belly's not empty.
translation.ko: 잠잘 곳과 먹을 것이 있는 것만 해도 어디야

translation.en: Barely a roof, barely not empty. Just enough to keep us here breathing.
translation.ko: 자도 편치 않고 늘 배고파 그저 숨만 붙어있는 거지

translation.en: -[horse whines] -[Illyana] Fine.
There's the world.
What would you buy if you had all its coin?
translation.ko: 저 세상 돈을 다 준다면 뭘 사고 싶어?

translation.en: I would get the hell out of this village and travel the continent.
translation.ko: 당장 이 마을에서 벗어나 대륙을 여행할 거야

translation.en: -Adventure? -Of course.
-Glory? -Oh, yes!
Girls?
I'd buy a gorgeous lake house.
translation.ko: 난 예쁜 호숫가 집을 살 거야

translation.en: My handsome husband and I would picnic and drink wine by the water
translation.ko: 근사한 남편과 물가에 앉아 여가를 즐기며 와인을 마시고

translation.en: as our children played jacks nearby.
You know what we should do?
We should take this coin and buy honey cake.
translation.ko: 이 동전으로 꿀 케이크를 사는 거야

translation.en: And how will our lady get her herbs?
Stop! Thief!
-Hey! -[child laughs]
This way!
-Oh! -[woman] Stop him!
[growls] Nutcase.
Save some for me!
See, it worked. [chuckles]
I knew it would.
[man] In Nilfgaard,
they'd cut your thieving hands right off.
Make you wear 'em round your neck for weeks.
translation.ko: 그리고 몇 주씩 목에 걸고 다니게 해

translation.en: Smart trick.
Odd loot.
Who you got who's sick?
Where'd a girl find balls like that in an alley wi' a man like me?
translation.ko: 여자애한테 이런 강단이 어디서 나오는 거지? 나 같은 사내가 있는 골목에서

translation.en: I steal them from smelly cowards who try to bully young ladies.
translation.ko: 어린 숙녀를 괴롭히려는 냄새 고약한 비겁자들한테 훔쳤죠

translation.en: Who are you?
A humanitarian, whose well-meaning ears have heard of a local lady
translation.ko: 난 인도주의자란다 좋은 마음으로 들은바 이곳 여인 하나가

translation.en: -lost to madness and fever… -[gags]
…seeing horrors that aren't really there.
That blue gum will certainly ease the affliction, but, uh…
a sword would kill it.
Name's Deglan.
And you're gonna take me to your noblewoman.
Or I'm taking you two pests back to the market.
translation.ko: 두 좀도둑을 다시 장터로 데려가기 전에

translation.en: [Deglan] A demon plagues this woman.
A mahr.
Puts you down with horrid delusions and feeds off your madness.
translation.ko: 무시무시한 망상을 심어 그 광기를 먹고삽니다

translation.en: Meteorite ore disrupts the demon's magic,
so it can be… removed.
Out. Now. All of you.
I'd like to remain.
Your boy's likely seen a monster or two in his time, no?
translation.ko: 아드님이 살면서 괴물을 한두 번은 봤겠죠?

translation.en: -Oof! -[Deglan] I'll be casting the spell.
-[grunts] -It's on you to catch the critter.
But I thought a witcher slays monsters?
[Deglan] To slay a beast,
you've first got to understand it.
-[woman groaning] -Study it.
Find its weakness.
I want this sucker alive and kicking.
If possible.
Steady, young fella.
And he asked to stay.
[Deglan] Never let 'em get in your head.
Better dead than fled.
There'll always be another monster.
[woman] Vesemir.
Fetch warm water.
My head…
Oh, my head hurts wildly.
Nice weight, isn't it?
How much you suppose the job cost that prick master of yours?
translation.ko: 저 졸렬한 주인 양반이 얼마나 넣었을 거 같으냐?

translation.en: Fear and ignorance are good business.
For your service, young fella.
Take me with you.
Not many boys seek to be witchers.
Even fewer seek a life of fetching bedpans and water.
translation.ko: 주인 시중 들길 원하는 아이는 더 드물죠

translation.en: And the girl?
Your blue-eyed lass?
You hesitated back with the mahr too.
Witchers do not hesitate.
-Stop! -Are you going to enjoy the day?
translation.ko: - 하지 마 - 이 시간을 안 즐기고

translation.en: Or are you still too shook from your daring night of monster-slaying?
translation.ko: 간밤의 용맹한 괴물 사냥에 얼이 빠져있을 거야?

translation.en: It was your first time, Vesemir.
Excuse me for wanting to be good at something other than serving.
translation.ko: 종노릇 말고 다른 걸 잘하고 싶어 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: Oh, I can see it now.
You, adorned in battle armor,
steel and silver swords,
saving the continent from kikamores, ghouls, and mad sorcerers.
translation.ko: 키카모어, 구울, 미친 마법사와 싸워 대륙을 구하리라

translation.en: Evil would tremble.
-Stylish armor, by the way. -Imagine it however you like.
translation.ko: 멋진 갑옷을 입을 거야 어떤 갑옷을 입든

translation.en: Only way people like us survive is to dream of ourselves as something else.
translation.ko: 우리 같은 사람은 오직 허상을 꿈꾸며 버틸 뿐이지

translation.en: Who knows? Perhaps someday I'll be a princess who commands the snow.
translation.ko: 누가 알아? 훗날 내가 눈을 부리는 공주가 될지

translation.en: Vesemir, I was only jesting.
You find our fates funny?
Why should I be meek and penniless like my father? Or you like your mother?
translation.ko: 왜 우린 우리 부모처럼 머리 조아리며 빌어먹어야 해?

translation.en: -What's got you so silly? -You wouldn't understand.
translation.ko: - 왜 그런 생각을 하는데? - 넌 이해 못 해

translation.en: Vesemir, out there, we're nothing.
translation.ko: 베스미어, 저 세상에서 우린 아무것도 아니야

translation.en: Less than nothing.
At least here, at the estate, we have station.
translation.ko: 그래도 이 영지에선 우리도 신분이 있잖아

translation.en: And if I could take care of you?
The coin that witcher made last night,
you should've saw it.
I'd get you your lake house, all your wine.
translation.ko: 네 호숫가 집도 지어주고 와인도 다 사줄게

translation.en: Anything and everything.
Yours.
So trade my debt to a master I hate
with a debt to one that I love?
Wait, Illyana! Stay!
You stay.
Lord Vesemir,
my new best friend.
Crossed a leshen on my way here.
So we've heard.
Meanwhile, I barely made enough this year
to score a night with a limp-pricked man-whore.
translation.ko: 힘 못 쓰는 남창과 하룻밤밖에 못 지내

translation.en: Your woes break me, Luka.
[Luka] Then we've got Sven here bringing back new recruits.
translation.ko: 그런데 우리 스벤은 신병들을 데리고 돌아왔네

translation.en: Bad enough we're putting ourselves out of business
translation.ko: 괴물 하나 죽일 때마다 일감이 줄어

translation.en: with every monster we kill.
Now there'll be even more of us.
[grunts] Not my fault people make more kids than coin.
translation.ko: 사람들이 돈보다 애를 더 만들어내는 걸 어쩌냐

translation.en: Also, short a man-whore?
Go fuck yourself.
Aren't you "short" everything?
Boys, monsters will fuck through the winter,
translation.ko: 그만해, 괴물들이 겨우내 열심히 떡 쳐대서

translation.en: then come spring, there'll be jobs from here to Nazair.
translation.ko: 봄엔 여기서 나자이르까지 일감이 수두룩할 테니까

translation.en: Until then, I say we perk up,
drink up,
and you two focus on breaking these brats into the world of witchering.
translation.ko: 너희 둘은 저 꼬맹이들을 위쳐의 세계로 안내하거라

translation.en: [Vesemir] "Witchers are rogues without virtue."
"True diabolical creatures, fit only for killing."
"There is no place amidst honest men for them."
translation.ko: '정직한 이들 가운데 이들이 있을 자리는 없다'

translation.en: My, my. How do you find this rubbish?
A few of the boys spotted 'em posted about towns on their way back.
translation.ko: 애들 몇이 돌아오는 길에 마을에 붙어있는 걸 봤단다

translation.en: "Tetra Gilcrest." Sounds like a botanist.
[Deglan] A purist.
Rambles about being a descendant of the first human mage.
translation.ko: 최초 인간 마법사의 후손이라며 떠벌리고 다니는

translation.en: Would it have vexed you to bury that lad's sisters?
translation.ko: 그 아이의 누이들을 묻어줄 순 없었느냐?

translation.en: You're feeding fodder to arses like Gilcrest.
translation.ko: 그러니 길크레스트 같은 자가 물고 늘어지지

translation.en: That's a wyvern tooth, not a basilisk.
I'll mix and match as I please.
[Vesemir] Look.
-You know me and children. -Get over it, young fella.
translation.ko: - 제가 애들과 안 맞잖아요 - 구시렁대지 마라

translation.en: 'Cause you're teaching fencing to the recruits.
-[Vesemir] Am I being punished? -I'm down two dozen witchers this winter.
translation.ko: 저 벌 받는 건가요? 올겨울에 위쳐가 스물이 넘게 모자라

translation.en: Wimps found employ in other more lucrative nonsense.
translation.ko: 그 약골들이 주제도 모르고 더 윤택한 일을 택했지

translation.en: So we'll all be slogging more weight.
A wonderful winter of abandoned little tragedies.
Lovely.
[Deglan] Now, this leshen.
Tell me you've considered the thing was bewitched.
[scoffs] I'm not a dullard.
A croon could pull that feat.
A higher vampire, definitely.
Or it could be a new breed of leshen.
Actually, just elves airing their usual dirty trousers of victimhood.
translation.ko: 실은 엘프가 또 요란하게 피해의식 드러낸 거였어요

translation.en: [Deglan scoffs] Shame.
A few new beasts would be… good for business.
translation.ko: 신종 짐승 몇 마리면 수지맞는 장사일 텐데

translation.en: [man 1] Why'd the witcher not handle this?
-[man 2] Lies and conspiracy. -[woman 1] Look away from the faces.
translation.ko: 온통 거짓말과 음모야 얼굴은 보지 말아요

translation.en: [woman 2] I'd heard the leshen'd been killed.
[Tetra] A whiff of basilisk breath could snuff out ten strong men.
translation.ko: 바실리스크 입김 한 번에 장정 열은 나가떨어져요

translation.en: [Lady Zerbst] Did you find the creature's body?
A witcher would need proof to collect his coin.
translation.ko: 위쳐라면 보수를 요구할 물증이 필요할 텐데

translation.en: And yet…
At least help me persuade the king
to send an envoy to Kaer Morhen to investigate, please.
Your acolytes have played to people's fears well enough.
translation.ko: 당신 추종자들이 사람들의 공포심을 실컷 자극했어요

translation.en: The mere act of sending an envoy would indict the witchers,
translation.ko: 조사단을 보내기만 해도 위쳐는 유죄가 되겠죠

translation.en: whatever the truth.
Do you know what's involved in making a witcher?
The horrors done to their recruits?
-Boys no older than your orphans here. -[children laughing]
Your late husband would've understood this.
I was an ardent admirer of Lord Zerbst.
He was open-minded.
Forward-thinking.
Married you, after all.
Careful, Tetra.
Or be quiet.
Kaedwen's laws grant a widow her husband's seat at court.
translation.ko: 케드웬의 법이 과부에게 죽은 남편의 직위는 부여하지만

translation.en: The laws say nothing about erasing what she once was.
translation.ko: 과부의 과거 신분이 말소된다는 조항은 없어요

translation.en: Well, how fortunate, my lady,
that few have wished to press the issue.
You ain't fed us in days!
We ain't given sleep, can barely stand up.
translation.ko: 잠도 못 자서 서 있기조차 힘들어요!

translation.en: Now you got us playing with swords?
I don't wish to be here any more than you do.
translation.ko: 나도 너희만큼이나 여기 있는 게 싫다

translation.en: I'll hazard a guess.
You all imagine there are better fates for you out there in the world.
translation.ko: 너희 다 저 세상에 나가면 지금보다 나을 거 같지?

translation.en: But out there, you have nothing.
translation.ko: 하지만 저 세상에는 너희 것이 없다

translation.en: But here, we offer strength.
-[boy grunts] -Purpose.
Respect.
A chance at surviving the very horrors waiting out there.
translation.ko: 저 세상에 도사리는 공포에서 생존할 기회를 준다

translation.en: If you don't want that, then this…
is wasted on you.
[boy] "And if you don't want that,
then this is wasted on ya."
Ugh. That dorbel's full of shit.
Master Deglan's preparing us for the Path.
-Better hardship here than out there. -[door opens]
Oh, there's a freeze tonight.
Shut up and steal what sleep you can.
translation.ko: 닥치고 잘 수 있을 때 자

translation.en: Ah, don't mind Tomas.
Law of Surprise.
Didn't know he belonged to the witchers till one came knocking.
translation.ko: 위쳐가 와서 그 법칙을 요구할 때까지 몰랐대

translation.en: Law of Surprise?
[boy] Fancy name for when you can't pay a witcher. Give 'em your kid.
translation.ko: 이름은 거창해도 결국 위쳐한테 자식 팔아넘기는 거야

translation.en: [Vesemir] Were you sold, or did you volunteer?
[boy] Uh, my folks dumped me here. Like most.
translation.ko: 부모님이 날 여기에 버렸어 다른 애들처럼

translation.en: Who chooses to be in this pigsty?
-Don't be so scared. -They're…
-They're going to poison us. -Who?
[gasps] There are mages here. Old ones.
Making witchers, they…
They'll kill us. Then bring us back, but…
we won't be normal.
-They call it-- -The Trial of the Grasses. I know.
I get scared too.
Then I think, "Soon, I'll be out on the Path,
stronger than most anyone, wanting for nothing."
translation.ko: 누구보다 강하고 남부러울 거 없을 걸 생각하면

translation.en: I'll never be scared again.
You'll come out the Trials better than normal, Tomas.
translation.ko: 시험을 거치면 정상이 아니라 더 훌륭해질 거야

translation.en: On my word.
-What the… -[boy] It's Vesemir!
[Vesemir groans] What's happened? Where are we?
Quiet. My pa used to talk about this place.
translation.ko: 조용, 우리 아빠가 이런 데 얘기한 적 있어

translation.en: It's the Red Swamp.
It's cursed.
It's crawling with evil spirits and beasts.
Griffins.
This is a test.
Like all the others.
On the Path, a witcher's first instinct is to survive.
translation.ko: 패스에서 위쳐의 첫 본능은 살아남는 거지

translation.en: It's about wits, not swords.
We follow the moon until we're clear.
If there's a monster close, your medallion will--
-Wraiths! -[Vesemir] Keep calm!
Stay together!
This way.
The medallions sometimes sense the bestiary.
-Especially when it's full. -[Vesemir] You're one of them.
translation.ko: 특히 이렇게 만원일 때 그들 중 하나군요

translation.en: The mages Tomas mentioned who make witchers.
You don't look ancient.
Well, mages age quite slowly.
Witchers do too.
Gives us both decades to hone our respective skills.
translation.ko: 그래서 수십 년간 각자의 기술을 연마하게 되지

translation.en: The Trials are only part -of my duty, though. -[snarling]
translation.ko: 약초 시험은 내 일의 일부일 뿐이다

translation.en: Don't fear.
It's merely a side effect of its hybrid genes.
Krallachs. [chuckles]
I've identified three different species in this specimen's makeup.
translation.ko: 이 표본의 구성을 살펴보니 세 가지 종이 섞였더구나

translation.en: -[gasps] -It's a nasty little crossbreed.
Master Deglan said monsters can't mate with other species.
translation.ko: 마스터 데글랜께서 괴물은 다른 종과 교미할 수 없댔는데요

translation.en: True. Though they can be engineered.
Imagine an army of beasts
designed to wipe out the elves and the Old Races
translation.ko: 그들이 엘프와 고대 종족을 싹 쓸어버리고

translation.en: to secure land and food.
The alchemy was…
inelegant, though.
Most crossbreeds died instantly.
[Vesemir] Mages made monsters,
then made witchers to kill them?
[mage] Today, my mages and I guard the secrets
translation.ko: 현재 내 마법사들과 난 이러한 돌연변이 교배의 비법을 지키고 있단다

translation.en: to such mutagenic alchemy,
translation.ko: 이러한 돌연변이 교배의 비법을 지키고 있단다

translation.en: preventing further abuse.
I'm Reidrich, by the way.
[Deglan] Are you daft, Reidrich?
A witcher deserves to understand its place in history.
translation.ko: 위쳐라면 위쳐의 역사 속 위치를 알아야 하잖나?

translation.en: A rider came while you were licking your wounds. Left a letter for ya.
translation.ko: 네가 요양하는 동안 전령이 와서 편지를 두고 갔다

translation.en: Did you know that Tomas and the others would die in the swamp?
translation.ko: 토마스랑 다른 애들이 그 늪에서 죽을 거 아셨어요?

translation.en: It's a numbers game, young fella.
-[faint growling] -[Vesemir] How many survive these Trials?
Depends. How many are witchers?
Letter's by your cot. Read it now, before I burn it.
translation.ko: 편지는 침상 옆에 있으니 태우기 전에 읽어라

translation.en: [Illyana] "Vesemir."
"Your thoughts are likely far from here, so I will be brief."
translation.ko: 넌 이곳 얘긴 관심 없을 테니 짧게 말할게

translation.en: "Your father is dead."
"Kaedwen took our village
and he was killed while helping the lord and lady escape,
-both of whom were also slain." -[child yelling]
-[wailing] -"Do not return home, Vesemir,
if this were ever that to you."
"I hope you have found warmth and comfort in this brittle world
translation.ko: 이 야박한 세상 속에서 따스함과 위안을 얻었길 바라

translation.en: and that the world is being kind to you, and most of all, fair."
translation.ko: 세상이 네게 호의를 베풀고 무엇보다 공정하기를

translation.en: "For me, a noble family from Kaedwen has claimed me theirs."
translation.ko: 난 케드웬의 한 귀족 가문이 날 거두어주셨어

translation.en: "They are kinder masters."
"They let me paint and show me how to read words, as well as write a few."
translation.ko: 그림도 그리게 해주시고 글을 읽고 몇 자 쓰는 법도 알려주셔

translation.en: "I am well-fed and at peace."
"There was little to miss in our burnt-out town,
and our snowball fights and alleyway desserts
translation.ko: 우리가 한 눈싸움과 골목에서 먹은 디저트도

translation.en: are heavy memories I now happily lay to rest."
translation.ko: 이제 기꺼이 지우고 싶은 버거운 기억이야

translation.en: [echoing] "Find your rebirth, Vesemir,
free of past burdens and hurts."
"And yes,
free of me."
"It is best that way."
"Live and love well."
"Illyana."
Right. So, who wishes to ride and get blitzed somewhere nice and quiet?
translation.ko: 그래 어디 분위기 좋고 조용한 데로 술 마시러 갈 사람?

translation.en: [sighs] We stay and see who survives.
[scoffs] That could take days.
It'll be Eskel, Lambert,
maybe Remus.
Now, can we please go get right properly drunk?
translation.ko: 그러니까 제발 코 삐뚤어지게 마시러 가자

translation.en: [Luka] Oh, let them sulk.
We'll drink.
The midwife almost fainted when I came for my payment.
translation.ko: 보수를 받으러 갔다가 산파가 실신할 뻔했다니까

translation.en: -[woman giggling] -I looked an awful terror, red and sticky,
translation.ko: 내 꼴이 아주 끔찍했지 찐득한 피투성이, 그래도…

translation.en: but, you know, that's the job.
translation.ko: 찐득한 피투성이, 그래도… 그게 내 일인걸

translation.en: [woman] And the striga? Was she cured?
[Vesemir] Yes. Yes, of course.
We need more before the next tale.
translation.ko: 다음 얘기 들으려면 술 더 가져와야겠다

translation.en: You know, that midwife should've hired a better savior.
translation.ko: 그 산파는 더 나은 구원자를 고용했어야 하네

translation.en: A man of virtue and honor.
A real man.
Not a mutant.
Are knights being schooled in striga curses now?
Where'd that lesson fit? Between learning curtsy and joust?
translation.ko: 그 수업은 언제 하지? 예법과 마상 창 시합 사이에?

translation.en: We're all here for a little drink and non-violent fun.
translation.ko: 우리 다 술 마시며 얌전히 놀러 온 거 아닌가?

translation.en: Is this the "your kind" bit?
You frighten these people.
As you frightened that midwife you swindled.
translation.ko: 네가 속인 그 산파를 겁에 떨게 한 것처럼

translation.en: Best you leave.
Right now.
I've seen knights try to do our job.
Tidy up monsters.
Cautionary tales, all of you.
Especially the cute ones.
The two witchers should be tried and executed. No questions asked.
translation.ko: 그 두 위쳐는 재판에 부쳐 처형해야 합니다 묻지도 따지지도 않고요

translation.en: [Lady Zerbst] Silly me.
Here I thought trials were all about questions.
These two killed two of your guard, Your Highness. You'd let that stand?
translation.ko: 기사 둘이 죽었습니다, 전하 두고만 보시겠습니까?

translation.en: [Lady Zerbst] Sire, the barkeep claims your knights instigated the altercation.
translation.ko: 전하, 술집 주인은 그 기사들이 소란을 일으켰다고 했습니다

translation.en: These witchers were defending themselves.
The people's faith in the monarchy already wavers due to the forest attacks.
translation.ko: 괴물 침략으로 왕정에 대한 백성의 신뢰가 흔들리는데

translation.en: Now they'll hear the crown waxed idly as two monsters shed knighted blood.
translation.ko: 왕께서 이 일을 대충 넘기시면 어떻게 되겠습니까?

translation.en: So we should go to war with the witchers?
If only so you can make them what you fear?
translation.ko: 그들이 진짜 괴물이 되는 걸 보려고요?

translation.en: They are deadly. On that, we agree, Tetra.
And such a battle would flood Kaedwen red.
translation.ko: 그러나 전쟁은 케드웬을 피로 물들일 거예요

translation.en: [Tetra] The Assembly should remember the lady's seat here is honorary.
translation.ko: 의회는 레이디 저브스트가 명예 의원인 걸 아실 겁니다

translation.en: -[attendants murmuring] -Yet it is still my chair.
Earned by her body. Not by blood or title.
translation.ko: 혼인으로 얻은 것이죠 혈통이나 작위가 아니라

translation.en: [groans] Gods, quiet!
I'll have my knights kill you both for the sake of my ears.
translation.ko: 하도 귀가 따가워 두 사람을 죽이라 명해야겠군

translation.en: Tetra's right, actually, sire.
Your subjects expect action.
What if you act on two fronts with one move?
translation.ko: 돌 하나로 두 마리 새를 잡으시면 어떨까요?

translation.en: Clear out our forests while also avoiding war with the witchers?
translation.ko: 위쳐와 전쟁하지 않으면서 숲의 괴물들을 소탕하는 것이죠

translation.en: -Guard? -[guard grunts]
Aye?
Do you hear that?
-It's like this pinging noise. -Hey!
Are you eager for a beating, mutant?
I'd settle for a pot to piss in and some halfway decent bread, please.
translation.ko: 오줌 쌀 요강 하나랑 먹을 만한 빵으로 족할게

translation.en: Ah. A bit generous, but…
[Lady Zerbst] No need to split this one.
Not like when we were younger.
I knew witchers aged differently, but, well, look at you!
translation.ko: 위쳐는 나이를 느리게 먹는다는 건 알았지만 정말 놀랍다

translation.en: Illyana!
No doubt you imagined me an old spinster by now, slaving away.
translation.ko: 지금쯤 일만 하다 노처녀가 됐을 거라 생각했겠지?

translation.en: That is if you ever imagine me at all.
Uh… your letter.
-You'd been sold to a new estate. -Yes.
The Zerbsts of Kaedwen.
They were kind enough, but it…
it was their son who was truly fond of me, despite my station.
translation.ko: 그 집 아드님이 날 무척 좋아하셨지 내 신분과 상관없이

translation.en: [sighs] It's been an age. Did you ever get that lake house?
Lake house? Oh, my, the lake house!
translation.ko: 호숫가 집? 세상에, 그 호숫가 집

translation.en: No lake, no.
But a nice home.
Turned it into an orphanage after my husband passed.
We had children too. Girls.
Horrors, all three of them.
One just made me a grandmother. I begged her not to.
translation.ko: 하나는 말 안 듣고 기어코 손주를 안겨주더라

translation.en: [chuckles] But they're stubborn little needlers.
They often remind me of you--
translation.ko: 걔들을 보고 있으면 네 생각이 나

translation.en: Oh, gods.
I'm… rambling.
You're bored.
No, no, no. You're fine.
You're good. Uh… this is unexpected, yes.
Little fresh. But, uh… also lovely.
You've had such a full--
You wish to kill my already-dead husband and burn the orphanage to the ground.
translation.ko: 죽은 내 남편을 또 죽이고 보육원도 불태우고 싶지?

translation.en: Not the precise words I'd use.
Lord Zerbst was kind to me.
By no means perfect, but…
he's someone you miss very much when they depart.
The tales I've heard of you, though.
The swashbuckling witcher for hire.
"The slayer Vesemir,
priced only for the foulest of creatures."
Well, not too long ago, you were stuffing my head full of those very notions.
translation.ko: 얼마 전에 나한테 그런 생각을 심어준 게 너였잖아

translation.en: Years do work differently for you.
[scoffs] What's time, anyway?
-Everything. -[door opens]
The king is willing to grant you and your friend amnesty for your crimes.
translation.ko: 왕께선 자네 둘의 죄를 사면할 용의가 있으시네

translation.en: Then you are reminded that I carry the duties
of my late husband, the noble Lord Zerbst, adviser to the throne.
translation.ko: 돌아가신 내 남편 저브스트 경의 의무를 대신하는 걸세

translation.en: Every deal has a price.
Kill whatever is murdering our people in the woods outside Ard Carraigh.
translation.ko: 아드 카라그 외곽 숲에서 살인을 자행하는 짐승을 죽이게

translation.en: And my colleague, Luka?
-He'll have my care. -Reasonable terms.
translation.ko: 내가 데리고 있을 거네 괜찮은 거래군요

translation.en: You'll take a chaperone too.
That, there, well…
that's a problem.
The Path's quite perilous,
and you are a lady, my lady.
Also, can't have a noble such as you
seen slumming about with the mutant likes of me.
translation.ko: 저 같은 돌연변이와 있으면 이상해 보일 테고요

translation.en: Then you'll no doubt be pleased to hear that I am not your chaperone.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 기뻐하겠군 그 동행인이 내가 아니니

translation.en: I have no intention of playing guide or nurse to you, witch.
translation.ko: 당신 호위나 보모 같은 거 할 생각 없소, 마녀

translation.en: I don't care who your great-great-whoever was.
On my word,
I will slay this beast.
For you, Illyana.
[Vesemir] Might not be a monster at all, either.
The leshen that killed your man Carlisle was bewitched.
translation.ko: 칼라일 경을 죽인 레셴은 마법에 씌었었거든

translation.en: By an elf.
-[Tetra groans] -"Why an elf?" Ah! Glad you asked.
See, another very old but very young-looking elf
translation.ko: 일전에 엄청 늙었는데 엄청 동안인 엘프가

translation.en: asked me to help him to find a group of misplaced girls.
translation.ko: 사라진 여자애들 찾는 걸 도와달라고 했었소

translation.en: Point is, witchering is a business.
You have to keep a brand.
Can't score the big jobs if you're known for swatting nymphs and helping out elves.
translation.ko: 님프나 때려잡고 엘프 돕는다고 소문나면 큰 건이 안 들어와

translation.en: Isn't fire magic forbidden by upstanding mages?
translation.ko: 불 마법은 고결한 마법사에겐 금지 아니었나?

translation.en: Only insofar as there are very few mages blessed with the skill to control the flames.
translation.ko: 불을 조종하는 능력을 지닌 마법사가 드물어서 그런 거지

translation.en: [chewing] Huh. You're very special, clearly.
I must seem silly to you.
But Chaos, it's…
Well, words fail description.
Witchers are connected to Chaos too.
Only your connection is corrupted and corrosive.
And far less condemning.
There's a story about a witcher who helped an ailing priest.
translation.ko: 한 위쳐가 병든 사제를 도와준 적이 있어

translation.en: The monster-slayer believed the sickness was, in fact, a curse,
translation.ko: 그 괴물 사냥꾼은 그 병이 저주라고 믿었고

translation.en: and could be lifted by killing whoever placed it.
translation.ko: 저주 건 사람을 죽이면 나을 거라고 했지

translation.en: The priest quickly fingered a local sorceress,
a stupid girl who always caused him trouble.
The witcher killed her, and was rightly paid in gems and jewels.
translation.ko: 위쳐는 그 여자를 죽이고 응당한 대가로 보석을 수없이 받았지

translation.en: -The priest obviously got better. -He did.
And then a few days later,
he found a beautiful gem amid his cook's belongings,
translation.ko: 자신의 요리사 소지품에서 아름다운 보석을 발견했는데

translation.en: identical to the one he'd given the clever witcher.
translation.ko: 그 영악한 위쳐에게 준 보석과 같은 거였어

translation.en: Ah. He had the cook poison the priest's meals. Cut him in on the take.
translation.ko: 사제 음식에 독을 타게 한 뒤 보수를 나눠 준 거네

translation.en: [exclaims] Smart con. Wish I'd thought of it.
translation.ko: 기발하군, 난 왜 생각 못 했지?

translation.en: As I said…
corrupted.
Ah, lovely.
-You've led us in a circle. -No.
I know these forests.
Hmm. So did Lord Carlisle.
At Aretuza, we used magic to cast pleasant illusions around unpleasant foods.
translation.ko: 아레투자에서 마법으로 맛없는 음식을 맛있는 걸로 착각하게 했어

translation.en: Made food tastier,
yet the aftertaste of the illusion?
Bitter.
Chaos clear our hearts and minds. Let our eyes see right and true.
translation.ko: 혼돈이 우리 마음과 정신을 맑게 하리라 옳고 진실한 것을 보여주며

translation.en: Lift the shroud that cloaks our mind.
-Lift the shroud that cloaks our mind! -[booming]
That illusion was flawless.
The power needed to maintain such art…
translation.ko: 이런 환상을 유지하려면 힘이 엄청날 거야

translation.en: [Vesemir] Could also bewitch a leshen.
Garean bhaedh aip me vhoelynath.
-Kitsu? -Friend of yours?
Friend of a friend.
Garean bhaedh aip me vhoelynath!
Yes. I'll need to know what and where your den is if I'm to avoid it,
translation.ko: 그래, 네 굴이 어떻게 생겼고 어딘지 알아야 피할 거 아니니

translation.en: especially since you're, you know,
translation.ko: 더군다나 네가 그 위에서 사람들을 잡아 죽이는데

translation.en: -slaughtering people over it. -Witcher.
translation.ko: 더군다나 네가 그 위에서 사람들을 잡아 죽이는데 위쳐

translation.en: I've never seen such a species of basilisk.
-Another illusion? -We'll no doubt find out shortly.
I know. She has that effect on everyone.
translation.ko: 이해해, 누군들 저 미모에 반하지 않겠어?

translation.en: But still, manners.
No! [sobs]
-It was real. -Might have slightly underestimated you.
translation.ko: - 진짜였네 - 당신을 살짝 얕본 거 같군

translation.en: Slightly.
Kitsu, this needn't escalate.
Witcher!
Her powers of illusion are unnatural.
First monster I ever encountered was a mahr.
Made a woman see nightmares that weren't really there. Illusions.
translation.ko: 한 부인에게 있지도 않은 악몽을 보여줬지, 환상

translation.en: -Kitsu's an elf. -Then why does she smell like a mahr?
translation.ko: 킷수는 엘프야 그런데 왜 마르 냄새가 나지?

translation.en: [Tetra] An elven school.
They used to send their young here during high summer.
translation.ko: 엘프는 한여름에 여기로 자식들을 보내곤 했지

translation.en: Before repurposing it as a garrison during your last cleansing spree.
translation.ko: 당신들이 시작한 지난번 청소로 여길 요새로 쓰기 전 얘기지

translation.en: No signs of blood.
I can still smell her, though.
Yes.
She was here.
Just before our fight.
Witcher!
I do have a name, you know.
What was done to them?
[Vesemir] They're all elves.
Girls.
[man] Over here.
Help.
Gods, not another favor.
Who's this one?
[Vesemir] My aforementioned friend. He was searching for those girls.
translation.ko: 아까 말한 친구란 놈 그 여자애들을 찾고 있었지

translation.en: And I could've saved some, had you set aside your love of coin and helped.
translation.ko: 자네가 물욕은 접어두고 날 도와줬다면 몇 명은 구할 수 있었어

translation.en: -[Vesemir] Kitsu's been kidnapping them. -Yes. Experimenting on the girls.
translation.ko: 킷수가 애들을 납치한 거야 그래, 그 애들한테 실험을 하고 있어

translation.en: She's using some strange alchemy to try to change them.
translation.ko: 괴이한 술법을 써서 애들을 바꾸려 하고 있지

translation.en: Change them to what?
Into whatever she's become.
I tracked her here, tried stopping her, but… Kitsu's power…
translation.ko: 여기까지 추적해 막으려 했지만 킷수의 힘이…

translation.en: And she just let you live?
I understand if that's a concept unfamiliar to your kind.
translation.ko: 당신 종족에겐 있을 수 없는 일이겠지

translation.en: If Kitsu was using sorcery to try and mutate those girls,
translation.ko: 킷수가 주술을 써서 그 애들을 변이시키려 한다면

translation.en: who mutated her?
Her genes were spliced with those of a mahr.
translation.ko: 킷수의 유전자가 마르 유전자에 결합돼 있어

translation.en: It explains her unnatural power.
translation.ko: 그래서 그런 힘을 갖게 된 거야

translation.en: She's a crossbreed.
How is such a thing possible?
The same way he was made.
Mutagenic alchemy.
Its secrets known only to mages at Kaer Morhen.
translation.ko: 그 비법은 케어 모헨의 마법사만 알고 있어

translation.en: You're behind all this.
That's ridiculous.
-[grunts] -Hunting monsters for coin wasn't enough?
Now you make them?
Witchers are struggling, yes, but…
Shame. A few new beasts would be… good for business.
translation.ko: 안타깝군 신종 짐승 몇 마리면 수지맞는 장사일 텐데

translation.en: [Tetra] More monsters, more jobs, more coin.
translation.ko: 괴물이 늘면 건수가 늘고 돈이 되니까

translation.en: Another sharp con.
-I swear, Fil, I didn't-- -[rustling]
Another monstrosity.
She's still an elf.
You saw what these creatures can do.
Fil, if the girl has even half Kitsu's power,
translation.ko: 필, 저 아이에게 킷수 능력 반만 있어도

translation.en: she's dangerous.
Doesn't this witch say similar of you?
translation.ko: 저 마녀가 자네한테 하던 말 아닌가?

translation.en: I will take her back to my people. She will be raised as an elf.
translation.ko: 이 애를 엘프 마을로 데려가 엘프로 키울 걸세

translation.en: [Tetra] Charitable.
Though I imagine it won't be too long before you sic her on us.
translation.ko: 머잖아 그 아이를 시켜 우릴 침략하게 할 테지만

translation.en: [Filavandrel] You won.
You beat us.
At least allow us the indignity
of scavenging whatever's left of our kind, mutant or otherwise.
translation.ko: 남은 동족을 거두는 치욕만은 뺏지 마시오

translation.en: As a favor to a friend.
Take the child and go. Now.
You have made a serious error.
Should that girl ever harm a single soul, Fil--
translation.ko: 필, 그 아이가 단 한 명이라도 죽인다면…

translation.en: Then I will slay her.
Quietly welcome you and your sword.
I should've offered up some coin. Then you would've handled matters.
translation.ko: 돈을 걸었으면 당신이 처리했을 텐데 아쉽군

translation.en: It was not a question of price.
Oh, the witcher's found his morals?
You think you're so pure, Tetra? Not a blemish?
translation.ko: 당신은 그렇게 순수한가? 오점 하나 없이?

translation.en: Look outside. There's your morality.
Rot and ruin all reeking of hate.
Tend to that filth, and I'll tend to mine.
translation.ko: 그 오물이나 치워 내 오물은 내가 치우지

translation.en: [Lady Zerbst] Nothing good can come of this.
[Vesemir] Fear and ignorance are good business.
That's what Deglan said the first time we met.
translation.ko: 처음 만났을 때 데글랜이 한 말이야

translation.en: Now look.
I need to know for certain.
[Lady Zerbst] I'd ask you to flee with me.
I know what you have to do.
And I won't have you feeling as though you've abandoned me again.
translation.ko: 또다시 날 버렸다는 생각은 하지 않아도 돼

translation.en: -[growling] -[Tetra] I tried to stop him.
-[hisses] -But witchers, they never hesitate.
[king] Madam Gilcrest has given proof.
This one breeds monstrosities,
terrorizes my kingdom,
and swindles the people.
What the hell are you talking about?
Sire, not all witchers were aware of these crossbreeds.
translation.ko: 전하, 모든 위쳐가 혼종의 존재를 알지 못합니다

translation.en: Lady Zerbst, you are testament to the perils
translation.ko: 레이디 저브스트, 그대는 이 폐단에 대한 증거다

translation.en: of trusting a servant.
translation.ko: 하인을 믿으면 이 짝이 되고 만다는 거

translation.en: Your Highness--
If it pleases, sire,
might I ask where Madam Gilcrest is now?
translation.ko: 지금 마담 길크레스트는 어디에 있는 거죠?

translation.en: [Deglan] Monsters were going extinct.
I had to protect our way of life.
Think of all the coin you stand to make, young fella.
translation.ko: 네가 벌어들이게 된 돈을 생각해 봐라, 꼬마야

translation.en: -Do not call me that. -Check your gratitude, boy.
You came to me.
I could've shipped you right back to those bedpans.
translation.ko: 널 다시 그 집 종으로 보낼 수도 있었어

translation.en: Don't pretend you didn't know exactly what you were doing when you threw me those coins.
translation.ko: 그때 던져준 동전의 의미를 몰랐다고 하지 마시죠

translation.en: You knew I would come.
We were created to kill creatures like these,
translation.ko: 우린 이 생물들을 생산하는 게 아니라

translation.en: not to make them.
I won't weep for doing what needed doing.
translation.ko: 해야 할 일을 했다고 후회하진 않겠다

translation.en: I told you.
[Vesemir] A witcher never hesitates.
Oh, I know.
What about with the elf? Did you give Kitsu a choice before you mutated her?
translation.ko: 그 엘프는요? 킷수를 변이시키기 전에 선택권은 주셨나요?

translation.en: No, I thought we'd killed her.
That mutation was unstable. Too much power.
translation.ko: 변이가 불안정했고 너무 큰 힘이 부과됐다

translation.en: Clearly, her death was one of her clever little illusions.
translation.ko: 죽은 걸로 위장한 건 교활한 환상술이었던 거야

translation.en: [Vesemir] All of this to line our pockets.
You were always too focused on the gold in your hand.
translation.ko: 넌 늘 네 손안의 금화에만 정신이 팔렸지

translation.en: You never looked up to see who's paying you. See their eyes.
translation.ko: 그 돈을 누가 주는지는 보지 않았어 그 눈, 공포에 질린 눈을

translation.en: We terrify 'em.
The only thing keeping men from hunting us
translation.ko: 인간이 우릴 사냥하지 않는 유일한 이유는

translation.en: are the scarier beasts we keep away.
translation.ko: 우리가 해치워 주는 더 끔찍한 짐승들이야

translation.en: Humans die quick, so they spend their lives fearing and hating.
translation.ko: 인간은 수명이 짧아 두려움에 떨고 증오하는 데 평생을 써버리지

translation.en: Ask the dwarves or your elf friend.
Men will always need monsters.
-Now, so do we. -We're all orphans.
translation.ko: 이제 우리도 그렇지 우린 다 고아고

translation.en: We've always looked to you to protect us.
You have to burn it to the ground… or I will.
translation.ko: 여긴 불태우셔야 합니다 아니면 제가 하죠

translation.en: I don't want to fight you.
We've got to protect ourselves, Vesemir.
Got to protect you!
If you two would like to stop trying to kill each other,
translation.ko: 서로 명줄 끊겠다고 덤비는 것 좀 그만하겠나?

translation.en: we have a visitor.
[Lady Zerbst] She's coming.
-[mob clamoring] -[man] Away with all witchers!
Tetra wasted no time. Word spread quickly.
translation.ko: 테트라가 지체하지 않았어 말이 금세 퍼졌지

translation.en: Not only of the crossbreeds, but of witchers protecting elves.
translation.ko: 혼종 얘기도 그렇고 위쳐가 엘프를 감싼다고

translation.en: And Luka?
This is your two's doing.
They were always gonna come, sooner or later.
[Vesemir] Well, maybe there was a way for us to die the better men.
translation.ko: 그러면 우리가 더 나은 존재로 죽을 수도 있었겠네요

translation.en: My mages and I are the ones who know the secrets to mutagenic alchemy.
translation.ko: 돌연변이 교배법을 아는 건 내 마법사들과 나뿐이다

translation.en: Tetra will want our heads most.
translation.ko: 테트라는 무엇보다 우리 목을 치려 할 거고

translation.en: If we die,
there can be no more witchers.
Seal yourselves in your labs.
The rest of us will rally and end her little cult.
translation.ko: 우린 모두 집결해 저 컬트를 끝내버리겠네

translation.en: Bitch won't see dawn.
translation.ko: 저 암캐는 여명을 보지 못할 거다

translation.en: Underestimate Tetra and you'll be the one who's seen their last sunrise.
translation.ko: 테트라를 얕봤다가는 당신이 내일 일출을 보지 못할 거요

translation.en: [Vesemir] Perhaps she'll listen to reason.
He may be a bastard… but Deglan is right.
translation.ko: 데글랜이 비열할지 몰라도 그자 말이 옳아

translation.en: This was inevitable.
Why?
-Because you're different. -[mob yelling]
[Lady Zerbst] And killing is easier than tolerating.
translation.ko: 감내하는 것보다 없애는 게 더 쉽지

translation.en: I want you as far away from this place as possible.
There are children here.
-They've been trained. -Children, Vesemir.
As you were when he took you.
I'll guide them to the cellar until the battle's won.
translation.ko: 내가 애들과 창고에 가서 승전보를 기다릴게

translation.en: For once, I will decide my place.
You've always had too much fire.
And beauty.
Please… I'm nearly 70.
So am I.
Beautiful peaks. Too pure for war.
Scurry off and return with the body of the man you murdered, witch.
translation.ko: 냉큼 달려가 네가 죽인 그놈의 시신을 가져와라, 마녀

translation.en: He was executed in the name of those your homemade beasts butchered.
translation.ko: 당신들이 만든 짐승에게 희생된 자들을 기려 처형된 거다

translation.en: There'll be no more of them, Tetra.
Upon my word.
Well, witchers are experts in price.
What is the worth of your word, Vesemir?
Some things…
are beyond cost.
And you?
Do you give me your word?
I give you nothing.
Save the chance to fill the valleys of our pretty peaks with your corpses.
translation.ko: 이 아름다운 산의 계곡마다 너희 시체로 채우기 전에 물러가라

translation.en: We are an army of witchers.
You are human.
[Vesemir] Kitsu.
[Tetra] She was gutted to hear how you sacked her den,
translation.ko: 킷수가 상심했어 당신이 자기 굴을 파괴해

translation.en: destroyed her work, and murdered the girl, her only child.
translation.ko: 자기 실험을 망치고 하나뿐인 딸인 그 애를 죽였다고

translation.en: Monsters to fight monsters.
How unlike your predecessors.
[Deglan] Rally! Rally!
Steel your nerves, lads. We charge!
-[Vesemir] Swords away. Swords away! -We haven't time to hesitate.
translation.ko: 검을 거두세요, 어서! 머뭇거릴 시간 없다

translation.en: Just bloody trust me for once!
Please!
Witchers, on me!
-Now! -[low booming]
-[Lady Zerbst] Be calm. Be calm. -[low rumbling]
You're safe.
Witchers must be wiped from the surface of this Earth,
translation.ko: 위쳐는 이 땅 위에서 전멸해야 한다

translation.en: and all traces strewn with salt and saltpeter.
translation.ko: 모든 흔적은 소금과 초석과 함께 흩뿌려지리라

translation.en: [Deglan] She's going for Reidrich!
Me and the others will hold the bridge. Use the drop to halve their numbers.
translation.ko: 저와 나머지는 다리를 지킬게요 물약으로 저놈들 반토막 내보죠

translation.en: You two, stop her!
Can you forgive me long enough, young fella?
If she gets Reidrich, it's the end of us.
Find her!
-Stop her! -[screaming]
There's a hatch in the grain hold.
It lets out on the back pathway.
How do you know this?
He was trying to run away!
Run as far away as possible.
All of you.
Rub the heel raw, to the bone, if you have to.
Don't stop.
[Lady Zerbst] Lower your swords.
This is genocide, Tetra.
They bred those monsters because of you. There is no purity here.
translation.ko: 인간들 때문에 저 괴물들을 만든 거죠 이 전쟁에 순수함은 없어요

translation.en: Just fear and hatred.
Enough, please!
This servant betrays Kaedwen to the witchers.
translation.ko: 이 하인은 케드웬을 배신하고 위쳐와 붙어먹었다

translation.en: Let her join them.
[Vesemir yelling] Tetra!
I can drop your men before their blades drop an inch.
[scoffs] Wishful thinking.
Are you going to enjoy the day, or are you still too shook
translation.ko: 이 시간을 안 즐기고 간밤의 용맹한 괴물 사냥에 또 얼이 빠져있을 거야?

translation.en: from another daring night of monster-slaying?
translation.ko: 간밤의 용맹한 괴물 사냥에 또 얼이 빠져있을 거야?

translation.en: [chuckles] Pardon me for wanting to be something other than a churlish knave.
translation.ko: 막돼먹은 놈에서 탈피 좀 해보려고 했지

translation.en: Look at you, though.
You're a witcher.
You're rich!
We'll lack for nothing,
and you'll take care of me, Vesemir.
translation.ko: 넌 날 먹여 살릴 거야, 베스미어

translation.en: Much like you said. True to your word.
translation.ko: 네가 말한 대로 네가 약속한 대로

translation.en: -Look at me. -A lake house.
Wine. Food.
Imagine the seas of coin we'd wade in.
translation.ko: 돈의 바다에서 헤엄치는 모습을 상상해 봐

translation.en: You never wanted that! You were always content.
translation.ko: 넌 그런 거 원치 않았잖아 늘 현실에 만족했지

translation.en: No, no, no!
[man] Forty tons of sheep's blood?
That poor midwife!
Oh, oh, tell 'em about the time you swindled the Redanian priest.
translation.ko: 그 르다니아 사제한테 사기 친 것도 말해줘

translation.en: Had him thinking he was cursed!
-How much did you take that fool for? -You can't be here. We lost you.
translation.ko: 그 맹추한테 얼마 뜯었지? 네가 여기 있을 리 없어 널 잃었는데

translation.en: What are you prattling about?
[cackles] Wake the barkeep, drain the barrels. Everyone drink!
translation.ko: 주인장 깨워 술통 비우라 해라 모두 마신다!

translation.en: Not a coin spared.
Enough! All of you!
Stop… stop cackling!
[Lady Zerbst] Vesemir, come look.
Be honest, now.
Well, don't just stand there. Say it.
You hate it, don't you?
[Vesemir] I…
I was just weighing whether you'd done my dashing looks justice.
translation.ko: 내 잘생긴 얼굴을 잘 담아냈는지 가늠해 봤어

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, gods. You frightened me.
Such a look in your eyes. So crestfallen and…
translation.ko: 네 눈빛이 불안했거든 너무 풀이 죽어서…

translation.en: It's perfect, Illyana.
Flawless.
Don't dally. I'm thirsty.
Mama! Make Bojan stop!
He's run away with my jacks!
What's wrong, Papa? You're making the sad face.
translation.ko: 왜 그래요, 아빠? 왜 슬픈 표정이에요?

translation.en: No, no…
This is wrong.
Enough mind games, Kitsu. No more fantasies.
translation.ko: 그만 조종해, 킷수 이 환상 다 집어치워!

translation.en: But you swore you'd care for me, didn't you?
That you'd protect me.
You're not real.
Truth is no illusion. There's no escaping it.
translation.ko: 진실은 환상이 아니야 도망칠 수 없어

translation.en: [gasps] Get away from me!
You left me here, darling.
Stranded in hopes and dreams abandoned.
And now you're trying to leave me again.
Only this time, I won't be buried
translation.ko: 다만 이번엔 넘쳐나는 옷도 없고 궁궐도 작위도 없을 거야

translation.en: -in dresses and courts and titles. -[thunder rumbling]
translation.ko: 넘쳐나는 옷도 없고 궁궐도 작위도 없을 거야

translation.en: I'll be as you are. Lost and alone.
Unloved!
No, Illyana. I love you.
Coin's your real lover.
More of her to pluck out there, isn't there?
translation.ko: 저 밖엔 뜯어먹을 돈이 널렸어, 아니야?

translation.en: Stop it.
We can be whatever we imagine here, Vesemir.
translation.ko: 여기서 우린 뭐든지 될 수 있어

translation.en: We can be rich.
-Together. Here, time is nothing. -[thunder rumbling]
translation.ko: 나와 함께 이 안에서 시간은 무의미해

translation.en: Out there, I can save her.
That's worth more.
Now, out of my head.
[Tetra] I know you never asked for this.
translation.ko: 이런 걸 청한 적 없단 거 알아

translation.en: You were only a child.
How were you to know?
[Lady Zerbst] Vesemir!
